Docs.summary: Represents a delegating chat client that caches the results of chat calls.

public: property bool CoalesceStreamingUpdates { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether streaming updates are coalesced.

value.para: if the client attempts to coalesce contiguous streaming updates into a single update, to reduce the number of individual items that are yielded on subsequent enumerations of the cached data; if the updates are kept unaltered.

remarks.para: When , the client will attempt to coalesce contiguous streaming updates into a single update, in order to reduce the number of individual items that are yielded on subsequent enumerations of the cached data. When , the updates are kept unaltered.
